title: General form
text: If "c varies inversely with r" then the general form of our relationship will be $$c=\frac{k}{r}$$.

title: Finding k
text: The constant k can be found by multiplying $$c r$$.

title: Evaluating k
text: k $$=c r$$. If $$c=40$$ when $$r=10$$, what is k?

title: Finding new distance
text: Now we know our relationship is $$c=\frac{400}{r}$$. To find the new current if the resistance were $$12$$ ohms, simply plug in $$r=12$$. Answer exactly (as a fraction).
